name: OSString
desc: A container for managing an array of characters.

items.name: + withCString
items.desc: Allocates an OSString object with a copy of a c-string.

items.name: + withCString
items.desc: Allocates an OSString object with a copy of a c-string, up to a given length.

items.name: + withCStringNoCopy
items.desc: Allocates an OSString object with a copy of a c-string.

items.name: + withString
items.desc: Allocates an OSString object with a copy of an OString object.

items.name: - getCStringNoCopy
items.desc: Returns a pointer to the OSString object's internal data buffer.

items.name: - getLength
items.desc: Returns length of string not including null terminator.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the string with an OSString.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the string with an OSData.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the string with a c-string.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the string with an OSObject
